text: Four Jills in a Jeep is a 1944 American musical comedy movie directed by William A. Seiter and starring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, Mitzi Mayfair, Jimmy Dorsey, Alice Faye. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 comedy movies Category:1944 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:World War II movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Seiter
title: Four Jills in a Jeep
